Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior, the base of one handle surviving and the lower section grooved, is covered with a brown slip and very faint traces of a white-painted text (?).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394332) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394332)
